monster.name: Saber-Toothed Tiger

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
trait.text: If the tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

monster.description: Source: Monster Manual p. 336, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount, Mythic Odysseys of Theros, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
